properties.entry: select d.docId, a.disease, j.judgement_id from i2b2_2008_doc d inner join i2b2_2008_anno a on d.docId = a.docId inner join i2b2_2008_judgement j on j.judgement = a.judgement where documentSet = 'train' and a.source = 'intuitive'

select a.disease, f.cv_fold_id, a.judgement, count(*) classCount from cv_fold f inner join cv_fold_instance i on f.cv_fold_id = i.cv_fold_id inner join i2b2_2008_anno a on a.docId = i.instance_id and a.disease = f.label and a.source = 'intuitive' where f.train = 1 group by a.disease, f.cv_fold_id, a.judgement

select term, 1, p from ( select term, numdocs/doccount p from tfidf_docfreq t, ( select count(*) doccount from tfidf_doclength where name = 'i2b2.2008-word' ) d where t.name = 'i2b2.2008-word' and t.numdocs > 1 ) t order by term

select cv_fold_id, term, judgement, 1, bin_count from ( select f.cv_fold_id, t.term, judgement, count(*) bin_count from cv_fold f inner join cv_fold_instance i on f.cv_fold_id = i.cv_fold_id inner join i2b2_2008_anno a on a.docId = i.instance_id and a.disease = f.label and a.source = 'intuitive' inner join tfidf_termfreq t on t.instance_id = i.instance_id inner join tfidf_docfreq td on td.term = t.term and td.name = t.name where f.label = ? and f.train = 1 and f.fold = 1 and f.run = 1 and t.name = 'i2b2.2008-word' and numdocs > 1 group by f.cv_fold_id, t.term, judgement order by f.cv_fold_id, t.term ) s
